Tanks A Lot! brings a new update. Become the legend! Download the latest version and be amazed!

Tanks A Lot! brings a new update. Become the legend! Download the latest version and be amazed!

Are you ready for a new gun and game mode? This update introduces “Venom” - a brand new canon which turns your enemies into scrap piles with the power of a corrosive acid. See how it performs in the all-new “HeadHunt” game mode where the results of a match can change even at the very last moment!

Rock the battlefield with the brand new powers of your commanders.
Our newly introduced "News" section will keep you informed about the latest stories.
Enjoy the latest round of tweaks, fixes and rebalancing!

Rock the battlefield with the brand new powers of your commanders.
Our newly introduced "News" section will keep you informed about the latest stories.

Welcome Commanders! This time we are introducing a spooky update to Tanks a Lot! Look out for pumpkins on the battlefield and fight for a chilling skin for your favorite tank. Relax with our freshly optimized gameplay experience and lots of quality of life improvements.

Welcome Commanders! We are happy to announce our latest winter season update is here. New Tournaments, commanders and tank parts are ready for the taking! Collect the gifts in battle and open your rewards!
Welcome Commanders! This update contains minor changes and quality of life improvements.
Welcome commanders! In the latest, update we are introducing a set of fixes that smooth the gameplay experience. See you on the battlefield!

Welcome Commanders! Get ready for our gorgeous new Resource Brawl and Crazy Football maps. Enjoy the view of our brand new bushes, now genetically modified to become transparent as soon as you walk into them. Relax with our freshly optimized gameplay experience and lots of quality of life improvements.
Welcome Commanders! This update contains minor changes and quality of life improvements.
This release introduces a redesigned main menu with slots that let you save up to three tank setups. Design your favorite loadouts and be ready to face any battlefield situation.
Welcome commanders! In the latest, update we are introducing a set of fixes that smooth the gameplay experience, and a completely new tutorial for the newcomers. See you on the battlefield!

Clans are finally here! Set up your own clan or join an existing one to rock national and global leaderboards! Experience new micro-achievements in battle (Mega Kill, Killing Spree, Rampage, Dominating, Unstoppable, Godlike, First Blood, Revenge) and play through 7 new leagues.

Rock the battlefield with the brand new powers of your commanders.

Welcome Commanders! Customization is finally here. Make your tanks look and feel really special and unique! It is worth to do so - bushes are now destructible, so you can't be hiding forever! Apart from that we are introducing a whole set of quality of life improvements.

Hello Commanders!
This update contains quality of life improvements and comes in preparation to new exciting features that are coming soon. Stay tuned!

Welcome Commanders! We are happy to announce our latest winter season update is here. New Tournaments, commanders and tank parts are ready for the taking! Collect the gifts in battle and open your rewards!

Welcome Commanders! We are happy to announce our latest winter season update is here. New Tournaments, commanders and tank parts are ready for the taking! Collect the gifts in battle and open your rewards!

Hello tank commanders! Check out the new stuff coming from this big update!

Three completely new PvE modes let players to enjoy in coop mode. Fight against an underground giant Worm, join your friends in combat against tricky Splitters and Raid the enemy portal guarded by dangerous towers. It’s unlike anything previously seen in Tanks a Lot!

Combat itself is more thrilling than ever thanks to the new Battle Modifiers in PVP. Such random modifier can turn the tide of battle, so stay vigilant!

We also have something new for our most dedicated players. The new Battle Pass progression system makes playing the game for long stretches extra rewarding and enjoyable.

Many other improvements and small features are also coming along!
See you on the battlefield!

Hey Сommanders!
With this update, we’ve added one upgrade step to all cards (cannons, bases and commanders).
Another thing we’ve changed is the shot effect of Cryo-gun.
But that’s not all. We’ve shortened the chest opening time by 4 times. So, you don’t have to wait so long anymore to know what is hidden inside.
Also, the Christmas decorations are already in the game to make you feel the holiday atmosphere.
See you on the battlefield!

Hey Сommanders!
With this update, we’ve added one upgrade step to all cards (cannons, bases and commanders).
Another thing we’ve changed is the shot effect of Cryo-gun.
But that’s not all. We’ve shortened the chest opening time by 4 times. So, you don’t have to wait so long anymore to know what is hidden inside.
Also, the Christmas decorations are already in the game and the Christmas event is in full swing. Complete quests, gather gifts, exchange them for New Year Chests and get the chance to receive the brand new base called Ice Dozer!
See you on the battlefield!
Welcome Commanders! This update contains optimization and bugfixes

Two big events are just around the corner.
Chinese New Year starts on January 12. Defeat the Dragon in the festive mode, earn Coins and unlock exclusive rewards: the new Huo Long cannon and the Dragon Paws base!
Valentine’s Day is coming as well. Starting from January 14 you will have a chance to get the new commander. His name is Captain Cupid. Destroy enemies, gather Valentines and open Valentine’s Boxes!
Moreover, Nikola Tesla’s stats are improved in this update. Check it in action!

Two big events are just around the corner.
Chinese New Year starts on February 12. Defeat the Dragon in the festive mode, earn Coins and unlock exclusive rewards: the new Huo Long cannon and the Dragon Paws base!
Valentine’s Day is coming as well. Starting from February 14 you will have a chance to get the new commander. His name is Captain Cupid. Destroy enemies, gather Valentines and open Valentine’s Boxes!
Moreover, Nikola Tesla’s stats are improved in this update. Check it in action!

• It’s time to try something new! We are bringing power-ups to the game. Each power-up is unique and can change the battle course significantly. Use them to add extra abilities to your tank. Obtain power-ups in the shop and set them in the inventory.
• If you don’t like the nickname you chose when you started to play you can change it for gems now.
• The new Iron Challenge event is coming soon. It will be another opportunity to get cool rewards!
• Also, this update includes improvements and bugfixes.

This update includes some improvements and bugfixes.
Here are the most noticeable corrections:
• In the Joystick shooting mode, you can tap on the ultimate shot button for regular shots as well as it used to be before;
• Non-active power-ups buttons are more transparent now and don’t block your shots.

This update includes some improvements and bugfixes.
Here are the most noticeable corrections:
• In the Joystick shooting mode, you can tap on the ultimate shot button for regular shots as well as it used to be before;
• Non-active power-ups buttons are more transparent now and don’t block your shots.
This app version includes minor improvements, bugfixes and optimizations - basically, everything for your better game experience! Just update the game and get back to battles!
This app version includes minor improvements, bugfixes and optimizations - basically, everything for your better game experience! Just update the game and get back to battles!

● New Power-Up Chests are in the game! You can obtain these chests in the Power-Ups Shop, on the Marvelous Sale, or get a special offer. Also, they will appear among Premium Pass rewards and event prizes soon.
● Now you can buy the regular Premium Pass and the Dragon Fight Premium Pass not only for yourself but also for your friend or clanmate as a gift.
● We have improved the damage numbers animation in battles, and now you can disable the display of tank health points in Settings.

In this update, we have changed the balance of some cannons and bases.
We have improved Huo Long, Nikola Tesla, Laser Blaster and Dragon Paws stats. At the same time, we have slightly decreased the speed of Ice Dozer.
Check out our in-game, Instagram or Facebook news to know more about the changes.
Now it’s time to equip these tank parts and check them in action!
